page.title: 17People of Riddings:Jobs-1
page.content:
We sent our questionnaire to people of ages 18_65 who live in Riddings. We sent 100 sheets out but we only got 45 back.
Number of people at work_38 people Number without a job_ 7 people
Type of job Simple job producing something: 12 Skilled job producing something: 2 Simple office job:(also jobs such as checkout operator) 2 Providing a service,caring for people 15 Job in which organise people 1 Selling you something 5 Providing a service,caring for people(e.g.teacher,car mechanic,doctor) 15
